display_html:
data Tx where
  • pattern Tx ∷ Expiry → Set TxIn → [TxOut] → Tx
name: Tx Tx

display_html:
class HasMockTxs a where
  • getMockTxs ∷ a → [Tx]
name: HasMockTxs getMockTxs

display_html:
data MockState blk = MockState {
  • mockUtxo ∷ !Utxo
  • mockConfirmed ∷ !(Set TxId)
  • mockTip ∷ !(Point blk)
}
name: MockState MockState mockUtxo mockConfirmed mockTip

display_html:
data MockError blk
  • = MockExpired !SlotNo !SlotNo
  • | MockUtxoError UtxoError
  • | MockInvalidHash (ChainHash blk) (ChainHash blk)
name: MockError MockExpired MockUtxoError MockInvalidHash

display_html: updateMockState ∷ (GetHeader blk, HasHeader (Header blk), StandardHash blk, HasMockTxs blk) ⇒ blk → MockState blk → Except (MockError blk) (MockState blk)
name: updateMockState

display_html: updateMockTip ∷ (HasHeader (Header blk), StandardHash blk) ⇒ Header blk → MockState blk → Except (MockError blk) (MockState blk)
name: updateMockTip

display_html: updateMockUTxO ∷ HasMockTxs a ⇒ SlotNo → a → MockState blk → Except (MockError blk) (MockState blk)
name: updateMockUTxO

display_html:
newtype StakeDist = StakeDist {
  • stakeDistToMap ∷ Map CoreNodeId Rational
}
name: StakeDist StakeDist stakeDistToMap

display_html: type SimpleBlock c ext = SimpleBlock' c ext ext
name: SimpleBlock

display_html: type SimpleHeader c ext = Header (SimpleBlock c ext)
name: SimpleHeader

display_html:
data SimpleBlock' c ext ext' = SimpleBlock {
  • simpleHeader ∷ Header (SimpleBlock' c ext ext')
  • simpleBody ∷ SimpleBody
}
name: SimpleBlock' SimpleBlock simpleHeader simpleBody

display_html:
data SimpleStdHeader c ext = SimpleStdHeader {
  • simplePrev ∷ ChainHash (SimpleBlock c ext)
  • simpleSlotNo ∷ SlotNo
  • simpleBlockNo ∷ BlockNo
  • simpleBodyHash ∷ Hash (SimpleHash c) SimpleBody
  • simpleBlockSize ∷ Word64
}
name: SimpleStdHeader SimpleStdHeader simplePrev simpleSlotNo simpleBlockNo simpleBodyHash simpleBlockSize

display_html: mkSimpleHeader ∷ SimpleCrypto c ⇒ (ext' → Encoding) → SimpleStdHeader c ext → ext' → Header (SimpleBlock' c ext ext')
name: mkSimpleHeader

display_html: matchesSimpleHeader ∷ SimpleCrypto c ⇒ Header (SimpleBlock' c ext ext') → SimpleBlock' c ext ext'' → Bool
name: matchesSimpleHeader

display_html:
class (SimpleCrypto c, Typeable ext, Show (MockLedgerConfig c ext), NoUnexpectedThunks (MockLedgerConfig c ext)) ⇒ MockProtocolSpecific c ext where
  • type MockLedgerConfig c ext ∷ ★
name: MockProtocolSpecific MockLedgerConfig

display_html: updateSimpleLedgerState ∷ (SimpleCrypto c, Typeable ext) ⇒ SimpleBlock c ext → TickedLedgerState (SimpleBlock c ext) → Except (MockError (SimpleBlock c ext)) (LedgerState (SimpleBlock c ext))
name: updateSimpleLedgerState

display_html: class (HashAlgorithm (SimpleHash c), Typeable c) ⇒ SimpleCrypto c
name: SimpleCrypto

display_html: decodeSimpleHeader ∷ SimpleCrypto c ⇒ (ext' → Encoding) → (∀ s. Decoder s ext') → ∀ s. Decoder s (Header (SimpleBlock' c ext ext'))
name: decodeSimpleHeader

display_html: simpleBlockBinaryInfo ∷ (SimpleCrypto c, Serialise ext') ⇒ SimpleBlock' c ext ext' → BinaryInfo Encoding
name: simpleBlockBinaryInfo

display_html: simpleBlockHashInfo ∷ ∀ c ext ext'. (SimpleCrypto c, Typeable ext, Typeable ext') ⇒ HashInfo (HeaderHash (SimpleBlock' c ext ext'))
name: simpleBlockHashInfo

display_html:
class MockProtocolSpecific c ext ⇒ RunMockBlock c ext where
  • forgeExt ∷ MonadRandom m ⇒ TopLevelConfig (SimpleBlock c ext) → Update m (NodeState (SimpleBlock c ext)) → IsLeader (BlockProtocol (SimpleBlock c ext)) → SimpleBlock' c ext () → m (SimpleBlock c ext)
  • mockProtocolMagicId ∷ TopLevelConfig (SimpleBlock c ext) → ProtocolMagicId
  • mockEncodeConsensusState ∷ TopLevelConfig (SimpleBlock c ext) → ConsensusState (BlockProtocol (SimpleBlock c ext)) → Encoding
  • mockDecodeConsensusState ∷ TopLevelConfig (SimpleBlock c ext) → Decoder s (ConsensusState (BlockProtocol (SimpleBlock c ext)))
name: RunMockBlock forgeExt mockProtocolMagicId mockEncodeConsensusState mockDecodeConsensusState

display_html: forgeSimple ∷ ∀ c m ext. (MonadRandom m, RunMockBlock c ext) ⇒ TopLevelConfig (SimpleBlock c ext) → Update m (NodeState (SimpleBlock c ext)) → BlockNo → TickedLedgerState (SimpleBlock c ext) → [GenTx (SimpleBlock c ext)] → IsLeader (BlockProtocol (SimpleBlock c ext)) → m (SimpleBlock c ext)
name: forgeSimple

display_html: type SimplePBftBlock c c' = SimpleBlock c (SimplePBftExt c c')
name: SimplePBftBlock

display_html: type SimplePBftHeader c c' = SimpleHeader c (SimplePBftExt c c')
name: SimplePBftHeader

display_html:
newtype SimplePBftExt c c' = SimplePBftExt {
  • simplePBftExt ∷ PBftFields c' (SignedSimplePBft c c')
}
name: SimplePBftExt SimplePBftExt simplePBftExt

display_html:
data SignedSimplePBft c c' = SignedSimplePBft {
  • signedSimplePBft ∷ SimpleStdHeader c (SimplePBftExt c c')
}
name: SignedSimplePBft SignedSimplePBft signedSimplePBft

display_html: type SimpleBftBlock c c' = SimpleBlock c (SimpleBftExt c c')
name: SimpleBftBlock

display_html: type SimpleBftHeader c c' = SimpleHeader c (SimpleBftExt c c')
name: SimpleBftHeader

display_html:
newtype SimpleBftExt c c' = SimpleBftExt {
  • simpleBftExt ∷ BftFields c' (SignedSimpleBft c c')
}
name: SimpleBftExt SimpleBftExt simpleBftExt

display_html:
data SignedSimpleBft c c' = SignedSimpleBft {
  • signedSimpleBft ∷ SimpleStdHeader c (SimpleBftExt c c')
}
name: SignedSimpleBft SignedSimpleBft signedSimpleBft

display_html:
data PraosFields c toSign = PraosFields {
  • praosSignature ∷ SignedKES (PraosKES c) toSign
  • praosExtraFields ∷ PraosExtraFields c
}
name: PraosFields PraosFields praosSignature praosExtraFields

display_html:
data PraosExtraFields c = PraosExtraFields {
  • praosCreator ∷ CoreNodeId
  • praosRho ∷ CertifiedVRF (PraosVRF c) (Natural, SlotNo, VRFType)
  • praosY ∷ CertifiedVRF (PraosVRF c) (Natural, SlotNo, VRFType)
}
name: PraosExtraFields PraosExtraFields praosCreator praosRho praosY

display_html:
data PraosParams = PraosParams {
  • praosLeaderF ∷ !Double
  • praosSecurityParam ∷ !SecurityParam
  • praosSlotsPerEpoch ∷ !Word64
  • praosLifetimeKES ∷ !Natural
}
name: PraosParams PraosParams praosLeaderF praosSecurityParam praosSlotsPerEpoch praosLifetimeKES

display_html: forgePraosFields ∷ (MonadRandom m, PraosCrypto c, Signable (PraosKES c) toSign) ⇒ ConsensusConfig (Praos c) → Update m (PraosNodeState c) → PraosProof c → (PraosExtraFields c → toSign) → m (PraosFields c toSign)
name: forgePraosFields

display_html:
class (KESAlgorithm (PraosKES c), VRFAlgorithm (PraosVRF c), HashAlgorithm (PraosHash c), Typeable c, Typeable (PraosVRF c), Condense (SigKES (PraosKES c)), Signable (PraosVRF c) (Natural, SlotNo, VRFType), ContextKES (PraosKES c) ~ (), ContextVRF (PraosVRF c) ~ ()) ⇒ PraosCrypto (c ∷ ★) where
  • type PraosKES c ∷ ★
  • type PraosVRF c ∷ ★
  • type PraosHash c ∷ ★
name: PraosCrypto PraosKES PraosVRF PraosHash

display_html: data PraosValidateView c = Signable (PraosKES c) signed ⇒ PraosValidateView SlotNo (PraosFields c signed) signed
name: PraosValidateView PraosValidateView

display_html: praosValidateView ∷ (HasHeader hdr, SignedHeader hdr, Signable (PraosKES c) (Signed hdr)) ⇒ (hdr → PraosFields c (Signed hdr)) → hdr → PraosValidateView c
name: praosValidateView

display_html:
data PraosValidationError c
  • = PraosInvalidSlot SlotNo SlotNo
  • | PraosUnknownCoreId CoreNodeId
  • | PraosInvalidSig String (VerKeyKES (PraosKES c)) Natural (SigKES (PraosKES c))
  • | PraosInvalidCert (VerKeyVRF (PraosVRF c)) (Natural, SlotNo, VRFType) Natural (CertVRF (PraosVRF c))
  • | PraosInsufficientStake Double Natural
name: PraosValidationError PraosInvalidSlot PraosUnknownCoreId PraosInvalidSig PraosInvalidCert PraosInsufficientStake
ConsensusConfig PraosConfig praosParams praosInitialEta praosInitialStake praosNodeId praosSignKeyVRF praosVerKeys

display_html:
data BlockInfo c = BlockInfo {
  • biSlot ∷ !SlotNo
  • biRho ∷ !(CertifiedVRF (PraosVRF c) (Natural, SlotNo, VRFType))
  • biStake ∷ !StakeDist
}
name: BlockInfo BlockInfo biSlot biRho biStake

display_html: type SimplePraosBlock c c' = SimpleBlock c (SimplePraosExt c c')
name: SimplePraosBlock

display_html: type SimplePraosHeader c c' = SimpleHeader c (SimplePraosExt c c')
name: SimplePraosHeader

display_html:
newtype SimplePraosExt c c' = SimplePraosExt {
  • simplePraosExt ∷ PraosFields c' (SignedSimplePraos c c')
}
name: SimplePraosExt SimplePraosExt simplePraosExt

display_html:
data SignedSimplePraos c c' = SignedSimplePraos {
  • signedSimplePraos ∷ SimpleStdHeader c (SimplePraosExt c c')
  • signedPraosFields ∷ PraosExtraFields c'
}
name: SignedSimplePraos SignedSimplePraos signedSimplePraos signedPraosFields
